summary: Project involves a map-based schedule view with day group labels/colors and enhancements to visually connect same-day itinerary items.

existing_features.title: In the 2D map schedule-item rendering (the schedule item SVG/text marker elements identified by the user’s selected XPaths), draw a visible route line that links all schedule items occurring on the same calendar day.

For each day’s route line, order the connected schedule items chronologically starting from the earliest item of that day, and use a stroke color that matches the schedule item logo/day color used for that same day.

new_feature_requests.summary: Draw a route line on the map linking schedule items that occur on the same day, using the logo color.
Order each day's route line chronologically, starting at the earliest schedule item for that day.

projectName: Draw same-day route lines between schedule items on the map (chronological order)
